attributes.action: Make it compulsory that all private cars in the UK carry a proper Spare wheel
attributes.additional_details:
It should be compulsory for all private cars  on the UK roads to carry a full size spare wheel.

Car manufacturers   are mis-describing  some spare wheels as "space saver"    when in fact they  are money saving for the manufacturers.

Even worse   are the  kits of goo which some cars  are supplied with.
